name: Tipsy Driver
description:
Survive as long as you can by dodging obstacles with the power of your tapping and timing skills. Each tap changes the direction of your vehicle.

Unlock new cars
The higher your high score, the more cars will become available.

Collect coins
Save them to unlock a new environment with more coming soon.

Change the camera
Try the top-down view and see if it improves your timing.

And no matter what, don’t let your friends beat your high score.
